alert.note: Alert for Edmonson; Grayson; Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 12:17PM EDT until May 07 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Hart County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Grayson County in central Kentucky... Northern Edmonson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1117 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Leitchfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Black Gold, Cub Run, Lines Mill, Broadway, Sadler, Pearman, Sunfish, Straw, Huff and Wax. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
